snippet: A second man who pleaded guilty to planning to attack a military recruitment facility in Seattle in 2011 was sentenced Monday to 17 years in prison.
abstract: Walli Mujahidh, second man to plead guilty of planning attack on Seattle military recruitment center in 2011, is sentence to 17 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: A second man who pleaded guilty to planning to attack a military recruitment facility in Seattle in 2011 was sentenced Monday to 17 years in prison.

headline.seo: Washington: Prison Set in Plot to Attack Recruits
headline.main: Washington: Prison Set in Plot to Attack Recruits
headline.print_headline: Washington: Prison Set In Plot To Attack Recruits
